meta.description: Determine the optimal number of personal and commercial software licenses to produce to maximize profits under budget and sales constraints.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost to generate each type of license

params.name: max_sales
params.description: Maximum number of licenses that can be sold per month

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of licenses to produce for each type

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.description: Maximize total profit from selling licenses

constraints.name: sales_limit
constraints.description: Total licenses sold cannot exceed maximum sales limit

constraints.name: budget_limit
constraints.description: Total cost of generating licenses cannot exceed budget
